description.ruby-sapphire:
Inflicts more damage if the
user’s HP is high.
description.emerald:
Inflicts more damage if the
user’s HP is high.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The higher the
user’s HP, the more
powerful this
attack becomes.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user spouts
water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.
description.platinum:
The user spouts
water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user spouts
water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.
description.black-white:
The user spouts water to damage the
opposing team. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful it becomes.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user spouts water to damage the
opposing team. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful it becomes.
description.x-y:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP,
the lower the move’s power.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP,
the lower the move’s power.
description.sun-moon:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the

description.sword-shield:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
